The last non-Lego Indy game I played was the lesser known Infernal Machine for N64. Never got around to playing Emperor's Tomb. It only just dawned on me today that there hasn't been a true Indy game in almost two decades but I suppose the Uncharted series kind of scratched that itch, albeit in a modern setting. Still, I'd be down for another Indy adventure, especially if it can take us to the less-explored early 1940s WWII era that Crystal Skull only alluded to.
